name: Summer Camps
description: Camp La ChupaRosa is a Spanish-bilingual summer camp in SF for magical beings ages 6-10 who want to explore nature while learning to care for plant allies through play and hands-on learning.
fullDescription: Camp La ChupaRosa is a Spanish-bilingual summer camp in SF for magical beings ages 6-10 who want to explore nature while learning to care for plant allies through play and hands-on learning.
whatTheyOffer: Camp La ChupaRosa is a Spanish-bilingual summer camp in SF for magical beings ages 6-10 who want to explore nature while learning to care for plant allies through play and hands-on learning.
cost: The cost for each week of camp is $650 with sliding scale, scholarship and payment plans available in order to make this offering more accessible.
